Articles.Content: So Space Engineers is a game that has similar wheeled-vehicle-flipping-over challenges to KSP. However, one of the features it offers to counteract that is an option for the players to set a soft speed cap on their wheels where they're set up to not provide additional acceleration above the specified limit. Kinda like cruise control. I think being able to set something like this up as a tweakable for wheel parts would be really handy for driving rovers around in KSP2. Make them feel a lot less tempremental.
